named-query.name: FIND_ALL_BY_TYPE_AND_CODE_AND_STORE
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM ProjectionEntity p WHERE p.projectionId.type = ?1 AND p.projectionId.code = ?2 AND p.projectionId.store = ?3 ORDER BY p.projectionId.code

named-query.name: FIND_ALL_BY_TYPE_AND_CODE
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM ProjectionEntity p WHERE p.projectionId.type = ?1 AND p.projectionId.code = ?2 ORDER BY p.projectionId.store

named-query.name: FIND_ALL_BY_TYPE_AND_CODE_NOT_DELETED
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM ProjectionEntity p WHERE p.projectionId.type = ?1 AND p.projectionId.code = ?2 AND p.deleted = FALSE ORDER BY p.projectionId.store

named-query.name: FIND_ALL_BY_TYPE_AND_STORE_WITH_PAGINATION
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM ProjectionEntity p WHERE p.projectionId.type = ?1 AND p.projectionId.store = ?2 AND p.projectionId.code > ?3 ORDER BY p.projectionId.code

named-query.name: FIND_ALL_BY_TYPE_AND_STORE_WITH_PAGINATION_AND_MODIFIED
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM ProjectionEntity p WHERE p.projectionId.type = ?1 AND p.projectionId.store = ?2 AND p.projectionId.code > ?3 AND p.projectionDateTime > ?4 ORDER BY p.projectionId.code

named-query.name: FIND_LATEST_PROJECTIONS_WITH_CODES_FROM_LIST
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM ProjectionEntity p WHERE p.projectionId.type = ?1 AND p.projectionId.store = ?2 AND p.projectionId.code IN ( :list )

named-query.name: FIND_LATEST_PROJECTIONS_WITH_CODES_FROM_LIST_FOR_ALL_STORES
named-query.query: SELECT p FROM ProjectionEntity p WHERE p.projectionId.type = ?1 AND p.projectionId.code IN ( :list )

named-query.name: FIND_NEAREST_EXPIRED_TIME
named-query.query: SELECT min(p.disableDateTime) FROM ProjectionEntity p WHERE p.disableDateTime > ?1 and p.disableDateTime IS NOT NULL
